authScene.claimText: Este servidor de Stump ainda não foi reivindicado, você pode usar o formulário abaixo para criar uma conta de usuário e reivindicá-lo. Digite seu nome de usuário e senha preferidos.

toasts.loginFailed: Falha no login, por favor tente novamente.
toasts.registrationFailed: A solicitação falhou. Por favor, tente novamente.

libraryConfiguration.heading: Configuração da biblioteca
libraryConfiguration.subtitleCreating: Uma prévia da sua nova biblioteca será exibida abaixo.
libraryConfiguration.subtitleEditing: Uma prévia das edições da sua biblioteca será exibida abaixo.

createLibraryScene.heading: Criar nova biblioteca
createLibraryScene.subtitle: As bibliotecas são usadas para agrupar seus livros. Se você quer uma atualização sobre as bibliotecas e como elas funcionam, confira

labels.libraryPathDescription: O caminho para a biblioteca que existe no seu servidor.

editLibraryScene.heading: Edit Library
editLibraryScene.subtitle: Use the below form to edit your library. If you're wanting a refresh on libraries and how they work, check out the

labels.libraryPathDescription: The path to the library as it exists on your server.

general.heading: General Settings
general.subtitle: Use the forms below to manage your preferences and account settings.

errors.updateFailed: A server error occurred while updating your profile. Please try again.

avatarPicker.heading: Set your Avatar Image
avatarPicker.subtitle: Stump supports custom avatars, which can be set by providing a URL to an image. Image uploads are not supported in order to reduce the amount of data stored on the server.
avatarPicker.preview: A preview will appear here once you have entered a URL.

theme.heading: Application Theme
theme.subtitle: Stump supports both light and dark themes, which can be set below.

dark.label: Dark Theme
dark.description: Use a dark theme for Stump, which is the correct theme.

light.label: Light Theme
light.description: Use a light theme for Stump, which is the incorrect theme.

locale.heading: Language and Locale Settings
subtitle: Stump supports multiple languages and locales, set your preferences below. Please consider helping improve the quality of
Stump's translations
if you're able to!

jobs.heading: Jobs and Configuration
jobs.subtitle: View and manage the background jobs available on this server, including library scans and scheduling.

server.heading: Server Settings
server.subtitle: Manage various configurable options for your Stump server instance, itself.

users.heading: User Management
users.subtitle: Manage the users on this server, including creating new users and changing their permissions.

signOutModal.title: Sign out
signOutModal.message: Are you sure you want to sign out?

desktop.message:
A network error occurred that suggests your Stump server is currently unavailable. Please ensure that it is running and accessible from this device.
If your server URL has changed, you can update it using the form below.

web.message: A network error occurred that suggests your Stump server is currently unavailable. Please ensure that it is running and accessible from this device.
